member.name: MFFrameSourceTypes
member.summary: Describes the type of data provided by a frame source.

member.name: MFFrameSourceTypes.MFFrameSourceTypes_Color
member.summary: The frame source provides color data.

member.name: MFFrameSourceTypes.MFFrameSourceTypes_Infrared
member.summary: The frame source provides infrared data.

member.name: MFFrameSourceTypes.MFFrameSourceTypes_Depth
member.summary: The frame source provides depth data.

summary.para: The frame source provides image data.
Note This value was added in Windows 10, version 1803.

member.name: MFFrameSourceTypes.MFFrameSourceTypes_Custom
member.summary: The frame source provides custom data.
